name: Medal of Honor Heroes 2
description:
It's June 6th, 1944, and the war is far from over. Step into the boots of OSS Operative John Berg
and infiltrate Normandy from behind enemy lines to undermine the Nazi regime. As a special agent
of the Office of Strategic Services, you must use tactics of combat, infiltration, assassination,
reconnaissance and sabotage to carry out the covert operations that will help defeat the Nazi war
machine once and for all.
Designed from the ground up for the Sony PlayStation®Portable (PSP®) System, Medal of Honor Heroes™ 2 will be the most comprehensive shooter experience to date for the PSP®. Choose to tackle all-new missions in a full single player campaign, or engage in massive continuous-joining
32-player wars online.
